content: I've noticed that I've been sleeping more soundly and waking up feeling more refreshed. I think it's because I've been getting at least 7-8 hours of sleep every night, which is my goal. As for my mood and energy levels, I do feel more focused and energized during the day. I think it's because I've been exercising regularly and making time for relaxation before bed. One habit I'm considering adding is writing in my gratitude journal before bed every night. I've heard it can help with reflection and positivity before sleep.
